abstract: The United Arab Emirates finance minister said Tuesday that the federal government would support Dubai as it grapples with a $26 billion debt restructuring and expects the matter to be resolved soon, Reuters reported.
snippet: The United Arab Emirates finance minister said Tuesday that the federal government would support Dubai as it grapples with a $26 billion debt restructuring and expects the matter to be resolved soon, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The United Arab Emirates’ finance minister said Tuesday that the federal government would  support Dubai as it grapples with a $26 billion debt restructuring and expects the matter to be resolved soon, Reuters reported.
